pli-tv-pvr2.13:1.1: Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.13:1.2: Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.13:1.3: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato …pe…. #1
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.1: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.2: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ catūhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.3: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.4: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.5: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr2.13:2.6: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti. #2
